name: XPERT
body:
### Welcome to XPERT's Homepage.
XPERT is a tool for identifying cross-browser issues in web applications.
Currently we are working on re-implementing the tool to meet the terms of licensing and contract from Fujitsu labs. **The current development is taking place in a private github repository and would be released as an open source tool in Fall 2012.** 

For updates on the development of this project, please watch this page or email @shauvik to be added to a notification mailing list.



### Experimental Data for ICSE 2013
##### Subjects used for the study 
* [Organizer](reports/icse2013/organizer/index.html)
* [GrantaBooks](reports/icse2013/granta/index.html)
* [DesignTrust](reports/icse2013/design/index.html)
* [DivineLife](reports/icse2013/divine/index.html)
* [SaiBaba](reports/icse2013/saibaba/index.html)
* [Breakaway](reports/icse2013/breakaway/index.html)
* [Conference](reports/icse2013/conference/index.html)
* [Fisherman](reports/icse2013/fisherman/index.html)
* [Valleyforge](reports/icse2013/valley/index.html)
* [UniMelb](reports/icse2013/unimelb/index.html)
* [Konqueror](reports/icse2013/konqueror/index.html)
* [UBC](reports/icse2013/ubc/index.html)
* [BMVBS](reports/icse2013/bmvbs/index.html)
* [StarWars](reports/icse2013/starwars/index.html)

Click on the subject name to view the report.


### Authors and Contributors
* Shauvik Roy Choudhary (@shauvik)
* Mukul Prasad
* Alessandro Orso (@alexorso)

### Publications
A detailed list of publications on Cross-browser testing can be found at the following pages:
* Shauvik's academic homepage: http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~shauvik
* Mukul's research webpage: http://www.flacp.fujitsulabs.com/~mprasad

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with XPERT? Check out the documentation or contact @shauvik and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
